title: Disconnected during a Ranked match, cannot reconnect because the match doesn't exist anymore?
body:
What just happened? My internet connection is rock solid and I never dc. For some reason, the game disconnected and then vanished both from my match history and from the login screen. I can requeue for ranked right now.

Riot?

replies.body: Sounds like the game crashed from the server. It's pretty rare, but when it happens it can look like the game just never existed at all in the first place. No worries though, you won't get any punishments or afks for that match and you're free to queue back up.
